Package com.weather.sdk.exception

package com.weather.sdk.exception
  • Related Packages

    Description

  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    ApiKeyException
    Exception thrown when there are issues with the API key.
    CacheException
    Exception thrown when cache-related errors occur.
    CityNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a city cannot be found by the OpenWeatherAPI.
    ConfigurationException
    Exception thrown when there are issues with SDK configuration.
    NetworkException
    Exception thrown when network-related errors occur during API communication.
    RateLimitException
    Exception thrown when the OpenWeatherAPI rate limit is exceeded.
    WeatherSDKException
    The base exception class for all weather SDK related errors.
